entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable TRACE_GC validation build once the build has been fixed #108628
  • ILAsm should generate assemblies that are valid for binskim #108627
  • adding a GetExpirationTime(Time-to-Live) method to the IMemoryCache #108626
  • Streaming response bodies from an HttpClient in UWP in debug builds will hang on large messages. #108622
  • `DiagnosticMethodInfo.Create(Delegate)` doesn't work with open instance delegates over methods on a generic type in CoreCLR #108619
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: Failed on .NET MAUI CI for macOS build: Fatal error in IL Linker #108617
    9.0.0
  • StackAlongDimension does not return correct result #108615
  • win/x64: Assertion failed 'false && "found use of a node that is not in the LIR sequence"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #108613
    9.0.0
  • osx/arm64: Assertion failed 'm_store->TypeGet() == m_src->TypeGet()' during 'Assertion prop' #108612
    9.0.0
  • osx/arm64: Assertion failed 'emitJumpCrossHotColdBoundary(srcOffs, dstOffs) == false' during 'Emit code' #108611
    10.0.0
  • osx/arm64: Assertion failed 'genExactlyOneBit(availableSet)' during 'Generate code' #108609
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'bbNumTryLast <= bbNumOuterTryLast' during 'Optimize layout' #108608
    9.0.0
  • SslStreamCertificateContext.Create can fail on Windows when calling process does not have rights to certificate store #108607
    10.0.0
  • Enable arcade -sign functionality in runtime #108605
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!op2->isUsedFromReg() || (op2->GetRegNum() != targetReg) || (op1Reg == targetReg)' during 'Generate code' #108601
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'link' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #108600
    9.0.0
  • More frequent timeout on outbound request after upgrading to .net 8 #108599
  • ARM64-AdvSimd: incorrect LoadVector128 summary #108594
  • .NET 9 assert failure #108589
  • HttpClient does not automatically follow https to http redirects #108588
    Future
  • Cannot build Native AOT for win32 on linux #108587
    Future

Closed

  • AV in clr in CI during `CEEInfo::getArgType` call #108586
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add GetRemainingLifetime Method to IMemoryCache Interface for Retrieving Cache Entry Expiration Time #108621
  • `dotnet --info` returns an incorrect value for x86 SDK with Non Native Host #108502
  • Port System.ComponentModel docs for .NET 9 APIs #105983
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Need a Reliable Way to Check to See if a Type is a Record Class #108531
  • [Source Generator] Source Generator works with dotnet cli but fails with `TypeLoadException` in VS #108164
  • [mono] Fix swift lowering for InlineArray when static field occurs before instance field #108522
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Simplify handling of RMW intrinsics in LSRA #104842
    10.0.0
  • Process.GetProcessById() doesn`t load StartInfo property #108591
  • Bug in IndexOf with InvariantCultureIgnoreCase in .NET 5 and above? #108424
    9.0.0
  • KeyPerFile Configuration provider does not reload configuration when K8S config maps mapped to volumes changes #91640
    Future
  • ILC compiler failure with SynchronizationLockException in CI #108590
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_55253/Runtime_55253/Runtime_55253.cmd #107891
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_18884/GitHub_18884/GitHub_18884.cmd #107892
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_11408/GitHub_11408/GitHub_11408.cmd #108360
    10.0.0
  • Project created with dotnet new wasmbrowser ignores the launchSettings.json in Visual Studio #108585
    9.0.0
  • Starting many threaded processes breaks asynchronous read operations when using WaitForExit(int) #108395
    Future
  • window.Module.FS.filesystems does not have IDBFS anymore in dotnet >8.0.3 #108580
  • Static readonly list not being enumerated in second foreach #108189

PullRequests

Created

  • Add `IsNetBSD` to `OperatingSystem` #108630
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Ensure to use float reserved register for TYP_SIMD12 #108629
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update IncrementingPollingCounter only on Timer thread #108624
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • fix stack 2x2 tensor along dimension 1 #108620
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • Delete DomainAssembly #108618
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [main] guard agains empty Accept address #108616
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Remove `uint` casts in `string.{Try}CopyTo` #108614
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Remove ldsfld quirk #108606
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • unblock cloning of loops where the header is a try begin #108604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Disallow SCEV analysis of non-values #108603
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetPEFileBase in cDAC #108602
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [browser][debugging][release/9.0] Removed trailing command that results in a warning #108584
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][debugging] Removed trailing command that results in a warning #108583
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [browser] stop testing with nodejs #108582
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Disable linux-x64 dev-innerloop #108581
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Don't call HasCustomModifier when the argument type is something normalized to ELEMENT_TYPE_PTR or ELEMENT_TYPE_BYREF #108610
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move more helpers from DomainAssembly to Assembly #108568
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Small refactoring on ps script for Stress Tests #108596
    area-System.Net
  • Fix getting default install location for x64 when running x86 host on x64 Windows #108538
    area-Host
  • [mono] [Swift interop] Fix InlineArray lowering with static fields #108546
    os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos, area-Interop-mono
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [RISC-V] Fix Int32 to Unsigned overflow check #107024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/9.0] JIT: Null out SSA def nodes upon removal in RBO #108548
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Updated tsaoptions.json to direct issues to runtime owners #108451
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta
  • [release/9.0] Fix IndexOf Optimization Code #108562
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix IndexOf Optimization Code #108563
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Enable range-based for over ABI passing segments #107174
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [cdac] Implement NibbleMap lookup and tests #108403
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108535
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix TRACE_GC build #108089
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Extend preinitialization arithmetic and string manipulation #105429
    no-recent-activity, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • MSFT:53847109 [.NET Core] DTS / UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups returns PrincipalOperationException: Information about the domain could not be retrieved (1212). #108032
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update stepping through MulticastDelegate under the Debugger #108414
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Use the managed codec for basic constraints and remove entire X.509 extension PAL #108578
    area-System.Security
  • Debugger should not manage exceptions during shutdown #105270
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add fuzzer for Convert.To/FromBase64 APIs #108247
    area-System.Runtime
  • JIT: Use edge weights in `LinearScan::findPredBlockForLiveIn` #108493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Optimize Memmove unrolling for constant src #108576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [GC] Revert distribute_free_regions changes in preparation for different strategy #108417
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Remove string.Trim{,Start,End}(ReadOnlySpan<char>) #108537
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • guard agains empty Accept address #108334
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • Set InstructionSet_EVEX flag in altjit. #108534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Switch `SwiftSelf<T>` position requirement to last #108547
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Investigate SwiftSelf<T> CI error #108554
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Interop-coreclr
  • [MonoVM] Improve thread state debugging and make it usable on Android #108401
    os-android, area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • Call native BrotliEncoderMaxCompressedSize method for BrotliEncoder.GetMaxCompressedLength #108043
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [mono] Fix vector class retrieval and type checks for binary operand APIs #107388
    arch-arm64, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] linux/arm64: Verify TLS resolver code #108564
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Allow stack allocate objects in loops #106526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, Future
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • JIT: Stop calling morph from CSE #106695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix SortedSet.InternalIndexOf 102118 #102249
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [wasm] Fixes for issue #108519 #108543
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-browser
  • [wasm] Read messages from binlog if process output is missing build finished message #107280
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Wasm] feat: Make boot json file configurable #108281
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • LINQ GroupBy Grouping can use InlineArray for first elements to avoid allocations #108569
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • JIT: Advance cursors through stores in strength reduction #105267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Track GC info accurately into epilogs in codegen #107283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Put all CSEs into SSA #106637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2554122 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Fix some minor errors #107179
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] disable debugger tests on CI #108178
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix macOS arm64 Unix breakpoint #108560
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
